entry.title: [connection] Build the language system
entry.summary: We need to confront what we used to fear. Perhaps this is the truly exciting moment that awaits us!
entry.content:
I know that using another language to express my opinions is very difficult. I may not be able to convey my feelings accurately, but we must take this path to improve ourselves.So I wish to do these things, even though they are very difficult.

Language is a tool that allows us to express the consciousness in our minds. If we wish to convey our viewpoints and insights to more people, we need a universal language. At the same time, language also influences our way of thinking and behavioral habits, presenting us with a more inclusive and open world.

We need to confront what we used to fear. Perhaps this is the truly exciting moment that awaits us!

entry.title: [notion] Customize Notion domain and link to Apple Calendar
entry.summary: Customizing the domain for Notion and integrating it with Apple Calendar is an incredibly marvelous endeavor.
entry.content:
Preface

Customizing the domain for Notion and integrating it with Apple Calendar is an incredibly marvelous endeavor.Below, I shall present to you a demonstration showcasing the process of establishing the desired integration.

Main Content

Dear friends, behold the moment of witnessing miracles. Join me eagerly as we embark on this hands-on endeavor.

Customizing the domain for Notion.

First and foremost, procure a domain name and associate it with Cloudflare.You may acquire detailed insights on the operational procedures by referring to this article.

Subsequently, within Cloudflare, you must establish a worker and input the corresponding code.

By copying the URL of the Notion page, generate your script code on this website.You may also follow the step-by-step instructions provided in the video below for guidance.

Synchronize your Notion calendar board with Apple Calendar

You can establish connections between Notion databases through the notion.cafe website.The following video provides a comprehensive explanation, invest some time, and you shall achieve success!

Summary

Feel free to leave any questions or comments in the comment section, and we'll catch up next time! Goodbye!

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <style>
    table {
      font-family: sans-serif, NSimSun, SimSun;
      font-size: 13px;
      color: #333333;
      border-width: 1px;
      border-color: #666666;
      border-collapse: collapse;
      width: 100%;
    }

    th {
      border-width: 1px;
      padding: 8px;
      border-style: solid;
      border-color: #666666;
      background-color: #dedede;
    }

    td.column1 {
      border-width: 1px;
      padding: 8px;
      border-style: solid;
      border-color: #666666;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      width: 20%;
    }

    td.column2 {
      border-width: 1px;
      padding: 8px;
      border-style: solid;
      border-color: #666666;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      width: 50%;
    }

    td.column3 {
      border-width: 1px;
      padding: 8px;
      border-style: solid;
      border-color: #666666;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      width: 30%;
    }

    img {
      max-width: 50%;
      height: auto;
    }
  </style>
</head>

This column is used to record learning notes on "Flight Management and Automatic Flight Control System"

Due to the bilingual teaching format of this course, there may be some difficulties in organizing knowledge.

In order to improve my English comprehension ability, I try to use bilingual translation for every part as much as possible.

I do not plan to create a separate blog post for each class, so I plan to integrate all the class notes into this module. Therefore, I will refresh this blog post within 1-2 hours after each lecture.

Thank you very much for Professor Wu's teaching ğŸŒºğŸŒºğŸŒº

æ­£æ–‡

è‡ªåŠ¨é£è¡Œæ§åˆ¶æ˜¯æŒ‡é€šè¿‡é£è¡Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ§åˆ¶ç³»ç»Ÿæ“çºµèˆµé¢å’Œæ²¹é—¨æ†ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ§åˆ¶é£æœºçš„é£è¡Œï¼Œè¿™æ—¶é©¾é©¶å‘˜åªè¿›è¡Œç›‘æ§ï¼Œä¸ç›´æ¥å‚ä¸å¯¹é£æœºçš„æ§åˆ¶ã€‚2

Automatic flight control refers to the automatic control of the aircraft's flight through the control of the control surface and throttle lever through the flight automatic control system. At this time, the pilot only monitors and does not directly participate in the control of the aircraft.

è‡ªåŠ¨é£è¡Œæ§åˆ¶ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ˆAFCSï¼‰æ˜¯å®Œæˆé£è¡Œå™¨åœ¨å„ç§é£è¡Œæ¨¡æ€ä¸‹çš„æ§åˆ¶ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯é€šè¿‡æ§åˆ¶é£è¡Œå™¨çš„å§¿æ€å’Œè½¨è¿¹æ¥å®ç°çš„ã€‚3

The Automatic Flight Control System (AFCS) is used to complete the control tasks of aircraft in various flight modes. It is achieved by controlling the attitude and trajectory of the aircraft.

è‡ªåŠ¨é£è¡Œæ§åˆ¶ç³»ç»ŸåŒ…æ‹¬è‡ªåŠ¨é©¾é©¶é£è¡ŒæŒ‡å¼•ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ˆAFDSï¼‰å’Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ²¹é—¨ï¼ˆA/Tï¼‰ç­‰ç»„æˆéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬å¯ä»¥æä¾›è‡ªåŠ¨ç¨³å®šã€å¯¼èˆªã€ç€é™†ã€åœ°å½¢è·Ÿéšç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚2

The automatic flight control system includes components such as the Automatic Flight Guidance System (AFDS) and the Automatic Throttle (A/T), which can provide functions such as automatic stability, navigation, landing, and terrain following.

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è¿™ä¸ªè§†é¢‘å…¥é—¨â€”â€”1.1 è‡ªåŠ¨é£è¡Œæ§åˆ¶ç³»ç»Ÿå¼•è¨€

You can get started with this video - Introduction to 1.1 Automatic Flight Control System

è¿™é—¨è¯¾ç»™æˆ‘æœ€ç›´è§‚çš„æ„Ÿå—å°±æ˜¯ä»¥ã€Šè‡ªåŠ¨æ§åˆ¶åŸç†ã€‹è¿™é—¨è¯¾ä¸ºåŸºçŸ³åšç»¼åˆè¿ç”¨ï¼Œé‡Œé¢æ¶‰åŠåˆ°å¾ˆå¤šçš„è‡ªæ§æ–¹é¢çš„çŸ¥è¯†ã€‚å¹¶ä¸”å…·è±¡åˆ°æ°‘èˆªé£æœºä¸Šçš„åº”ç”¨ã€‚ä»ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒæŠ½è±¡çš„ç†è®ºçŸ¥è¯†åˆ°å…·ä½“çš„å®è·µåº”ç”¨ã€‚ æˆ‘åˆ™å…³æ³¨äºè¿™æœŸé—´çš„ç†è®ºæ˜¯å¦‚ä½•è½¬æ¢åˆ°å®è·µå½“ä¸­å»çš„ã€‚

The most intuitive feeling this course gave me was to use the course "Principles of Automatic Control" as the foundation for comprehensive application, which involves a lot of knowledge in the field of self-control. And concrete application to civil aviation aircraft. From a relatively abstract theoretical knowledge to specific practical applications.

I focused on how the theory during this period was transformed into practice.

Aug 29,23 æˆè¯¾åŠæ„Ÿå—

åˆšå¼€å§‹åŒè¯­æˆè¯¾ï¼Œæœ‰ç‚¹ä¸ä¹ æƒ¯ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå­˜åœ¨ç€å¾ˆå¤šä¸“ä¸šåè¯çš„ç†è§£é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æœ¬èº«å¯¹è‹±è¯­çš„ç†è§£èƒ½åŠ›è‡³å°‘æ˜¯ä½äºä¸­æ–‡ç†è§£èƒ½åŠ›çš„ 3-5 å€ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿˜æ˜¯åˆšå¼€å§‹çš„ç¬¬ä¸€èŠ‚è¯¾ï¼Œä¼šå¥½ä¸€äº›ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿˜æ˜¯å°½å¯èƒ½å»åŠ å¼ºè‹±è¯­ä¸ä¸“ä¸šè¯¾ä¹‹é—´çš„è¡”æ¥èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚

At the beginning of bilingual teaching, I feel a bit uncomfortable because there are many problems with understanding professional terms, and my own understanding of English is at least 3-5 times lower than that of Chinese. As it is still the first class, it will be better, but I still try to strengthen the connection between English and professional courses as much as possible.
